content: this cowl is super fast uses worsted weight or aran yarn and a u s size i crochet hook you begin the cowl in the center front and work flat while making the simple single_crochet increasing pattern then you will join and work in the round this cowl is warm squishy and makes a wonderful gift or craft fair item i suggest using yarn that is a little drapey this is a great 1-skeiner suggestion you can also dress this cowl up by adding your favorite picot edging
